wikitext.*:
[[Image:Christopher Tolkien - Numenore.png|thumb|The ''Númenórë'' map]]
The '''Númenórë''' map, appearing in the ''[[Unfinished Tales]]'', depicts the island of [[Númenor]].<ref>{{UT|NMap}}</ref>

The map is a redrawing by [[Christopher Tolkien]] from what probably was the only sketch of Númenor made by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref name="UT">{{UT|Introduction}}, PART TWO, I ''A Description of the Island of Númenor''</ref>

The sketch-map of Númenor was only published in the book [[Tolkien: Maker of Middle-earth]]. It includes the haven of ''[[Almaida]]'', which apparently is not mentioned elsewhere in the [[legendarium]].<ref name="UT" />

In the ''[https://tai.tolkienists.org/ Tolkien Art Index],'' the sketch corresponds to the item ''[https://tai.tolkienists.org/tai/538/ #538]'' and the redrawn map corresponds to the item ''[https://tai.tolkienists.org/tai/544/ #544].''

''[[The Fall of Númenor]]'' includes a [[:File:Númenórë (colorized).jpeg|colorized version]] of this map.
